thread.title: Trump Says Campaign Would Collapse Without Him
thread.title_full: Trump Says Campaign Would Collapse Without Him

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Trump Says Campaign Would Collapse Without Him
text:
Trump Says Campaign Would Collapse Without Him October 6, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Donald Trump predicts a “major collapse” in the Republican campaign and a “depression” for the television industry should he prematurely exit the presidential race, the New York Times reports. 
Said Trump: “There’d be a major collapse of the race, and there’d be a major collapse of television ratings. It would become a depression in television.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
